themes: role of master creators in public projects
key_phrases: research based and proven to work methodology
track record of immersive research and past relevant results
Arts in public spaces created by the public
under the guidance of a master creator
discussed, designed, physically created by members of the community
barriers_identified: lack of research-based and proven arts education programs
absence of research-driven fellowships with demonstrated results
insufficient opportunities for community-led public art creation
solutions_proposed: Offer arts educational programming based on research-proven methodologies
Create arts research fellowships with a focus on innovation and immersive research
Facilitate public art projects designed and created by the community under expert guidance
